snippet: The government of El Salvador said Monday that the truce between the country’s main street gangs had not worked, and that killings and attacks against the police had risen again.
lead_paragraph: The government of El Salvador said Monday that the truce between the country’s main street gangs had not worked, and that killings and attacks against the police had risen again.

headline.main: El Salvador: Gang Truce Fails to Ease Violence, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: El Salvador: Gang Truce Fails To Ease Violence, Officials Say
